thread.title: Rs 50.54 lakh, liquor seized

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Rs 50.54 lakh, liquor seized
text:
Patna, October 2
A sum of Rs 50.54 lakh unaccounted cash and 11,344 litre illegal liquor were seized in the past 24 hours during an intensive drive in various areas of poll-bound Bihar. While Rs 28.85 lakh accounted cash was seized from Gopalganj district, Rs 10 lakh from Athmalgola locality in the state capital, a release issued by the Chief Electoral Officer said today. Rs 3.79 lakh unaccounted cash was seized in Begusarai followed by Rs 3 lakh from Hathdah area in Patna, Rs 2.4 lakh in Vaishali, Rs 1.5 lakh in Gaya and Rs 1.01 lakh in Arwal, it said. â€” PTI
